segments.text: Lindsay Tipping gave me your name as a reference . We are considering hiring her as an editor for our magazine .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Lindsay , of course , I will be more than happy to recommend her to you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long was she employed with your company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She freelanced with us for 3 years . She was always consistent and punctual with her assignments and a pleasure to work with .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Freelance , hmm . How do you think she will manage in an office environment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: She ’ s a consummate professional and a team-player . I have utmost confidence in her abilities . You can ’ t go wrong in hiring her .
segments.speaker: S2
